title: ASHRAE 90.1 PRM Air Loop DOAS HVAC User Data

name.description: Identifier or name for the air loop configuration

has_fan_power_credit_fully_ducted.description: Fan power credit for fully ducted systems
has_fan_power_credit_fully_ducted.$comment: Set this field to the number of return or exhaust systems required by code or accreditation standards to be fully ducted, or systems required to maintain air pressure differentials between adjacent rooms that the airloop HVAC object includes. If it doesnt apply, set this field to 0.

has_fan_power_credit_return_or_exhaust_f.description: Fan power credit for return or exhaust flow control
has_fan_power_credit_return_or_exhaust_f.$comment: Set this field to the number of return and/or exhaust airflow control devices that the airloop HVAC object includes. If it doesnt apply, set this field to 0.

fan_power_credit_exhaust_treatment.description: Fan power credit for exhaust treatment
fan_power_credit_exhaust_treatment.$comment: Set this field to the sum of the pressure-drop (calculated at fan system design conditions) of all exhaust filters, scrubbers, or other exhaust treatment devices that the airloop HVAC object includes. If it doesnt apply, set this field to 0.

has_fan_power_credit_filtration_m9to12.description: Fan power credit for MERV 9-12 filtration
has_fan_power_credit_filtration_m9to12.$comment: Set this field to the number of MERV 9 through 12 filters that the airloop HVAC object includes. If it doesnt apply, set this field to 0.

has_fan_power_credit_filtration_m13to15.description: Fan power credit for MERV 13-15 filtration
has_fan_power_credit_filtration_m13to15.$comment: Set this field to the number of MERV 13 through 15 filters that the airloop HVAC object includes. If it doesnt apply, set this field to 0.

clean_filter_pressure_drop_for_fan_power.description: Clean filter pressure drop for MERV 16+ filtration fan power credit
clean_filter_pressure_drop_for_fan_power.$comment: Set this field to the sum of the pressure-drop (calculated at 2 times the clean filter pressure-drop at fan system design conditions) of all MERV 16+ filters and electronically enhanced filters that the airloop HVAC object includes. If it doesnt apply, set this field to 0.

fan_power_credit_gas_phase_cleaners.description: Fan power credit for gas phase cleaners
fan_power_credit_gas_phase_cleaners.$comment: Set this field to the sum of carbon and other gas-phase air cleanersâ€™ pressure-drop (at the fan system design conditions) that the airloop HVAC object includes. If it doesnt apply, set this field to 0.

fan_power_credit_biosafety.description: Fan power credit for biosafety measures
fan_power_credit_biosafety.$comment: Set this field to the sum of the pressure-drop (calculated at fan system design conditions) of biosafety cabinets that the airloop HVAC object includes. If it doesnt apply, set this field to 0.

fan_power_credit_other_than_coil_runarou.description: Fan power credit for other than coil runaround
fan_power_credit_other_than_coil_runarou.$comment: Set this field to the number of energy recovery devices other than coil runaround loop that the airloop HVAC object includes. If it doesnt apply, set this field to 0.

has_fan_power_credit_coil_runaround.description: Fan power credit for coil runaround
has_fan_power_credit_coil_runaround.$comment: Set this field to the number of runaround loop that the airloop HVAC object includes. If it doesnt apply, set this field to 0.

fan_power_credit_evaporative_humidifier_.description: Fan power credit for evaporative humidifier or cooler
fan_power_credit_evaporative_humidifier_.$comment: Set this field to the sum of the pressure-drop (calculated at fan system design conditions) of the evaporative humidifier or cooler that the airloop HVAC object includes. If it doesnt apply, set this field to 0.

has_fan_power_credit_sound_attenuation.description: Fan power credit for sound attenuation
has_fan_power_credit_sound_attenuation.$comment: Set this field to the number of sound attenuation sections of fans serving spaces with design background noise goals below NC35 that the airloop HVAC object includes. If it doesnt apply, set this field to 0.

has_fan_power_credit_exhaust_serving_fum.description: Fan power credit for exhaust serving fume hoods
has_fan_power_credit_exhaust_serving_fum.$comment: Set this field to the number of exhaust systems serving fume hoods that the airloop HVAC object includes. If it doesnt apply, set this field to 0.

has_fan_power_credit_lab_or_vivarium_hig.description: Fan power credit for lab or vivarium highrise vertical duct
has_fan_power_credit_lab_or_vivarium_hig.$comment: Set this field to the number of laboratory and vivarium exhaust systems in high-rise buildings that the airloop HVAC object includes. If it doesnt apply, set this field to 0.
